title: Kannukulla Dude Lyrics Tamil & Meaning | Sai Abhyankkar | Jonita Gandhi

sections.intro: Fall in love all over again with Kannukulla, the soul-stirring melody from the movie Dude. Composed by the viral sensation Sai Abhyankkar and sung by the enchanting Jonita Gandhi, this song has captured hearts across Tamil Nadu. Discover the poetic depth behind Adesh KrishnaтАЩs lyrics in our full breakdown.
sections.easterEgg:
Hidden Details You Missed! ЁЯХ╡я╕ПтАНтЩВя╕П

  • The song features a subtle 'Unplugged' feel in the first verse, which Sai Abhyankkar intentionally designed to highlight Jonita Gandhi's vocal texture before the heavy synth kicks in.
  • At [02:15], there is a melodic callback to the 'Katchi Sera' rhythm, a signature production style Sai Abhyankkar uses to link his independent and film discographies.
  • The line 'Yaar pazhiyo, Yaar pizhayo' is rumored to hint at the central conflict of the movie Dude, where the leads are separated due to a simple misunderstanding.
sections.faq:
Frequently Asked Questions

Who are the singers of the song Kannukulla?

The song is a duet performed by Jonita Gandhi and the music director himself, Sai Abhyankkar, with additional vocals by Arjun.

What is the theme of the lyrics in Kannukulla?

The lyrics, written by Adesh Krishna, focus on 'Aathirupun' (waiting) and longing, depicting a lover's hope to reunite with their partner at the place they parted.

stanzas:
En kannukulla kaththadha
Nenjukulla nachadhe
Solle podhum.. Un solle podhum..

En anba motthom pichchane
Kovam vechu thechchane
Innum venum.. Oh innum venum..

Vittu pona vaasalile..
Vaazhka theera kaathirukken
Kaathilulla kaadhalellam..
Kooti kaathu thaarenen naan

Oda oda naan mela saanjika
Theera theera un thol illaya?
Eeram Eeram kan oram medhuvaa pothume..

Yaar pazhiyo.. Yaar pizhayo..
Yaar vecha kan muzhiyo..
Naan keta kelvikku.. nee mattum thaa vidaiyo..

englishStanzas:
En kannukkulla kathaadha
Nenjukkulla nachaadha
Adha solle podhum un solle podhum

[Don't shout inside my eyes; don't nag inside my heart; just that word of yours is enough.]


En anba mutham vachaane
Kovam vachu thachaane
Innum venum oh innum venum

[You sealed my love with a kiss and stitched it with anger; I want more, oh I want more.]


Vittu pona vaasalile
vaazhkai thira kaathirukken
Kaathil ulla kaadhalellaam kootti kaathu thaarenaa

[I wait at the doorstep we left behind for life to open; shall I gather all the love in the air and protect it for you?]


Oda oda naan mela saanjikka
Theera theera un thozhilaiyaa
Eeram eeram kannoram medhuvaa podhume

[As I lean on you while we run, don't you feel it's never-ending? The moisture slowly moves at the corner of my eyes.]


Yaar pazhiyo yaar pizhaiyo
Yaar vacha kanmuzhiyo
Naan ketta kelvikku nee mattumdhaan vidaiyo

[Whose fault is it? Whose mistake? Who set this language of the eyes? For the question I asked, you are the only answer.]


Ennaagum en vidhiyo ennaagum en vidhiyo
Vittu pona vaasalile
vaazhkai theera kaathirukka

[What will become of my fate? I wait for life to fulfill at that abandoned doorstep.]


Oda oda naan mela saanjikka
Theera theera un thozhilaiyaa
Eeram eeram en kannorama odudhe

[As I lean my heart while running, doesn't it flow endlessly within you? The tears are flowing at the corner of my eyes.]


Aavalum aazhudhu paadalum neeludhu Yekkam illa idhu ver edho puriyalaye

[My yearning is weeping; the song is lengthening; this isn't just longing, it's something else I don't understand.]


Theevaram thaangala theeravum thonala Theevula thooki potta thana udanjen ulla

[I can't bear the intensity; it doesn't seem to end; even if thrown on an island, I broke down within myself.]
